trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class is used to represent an access control entry (ACE) in the discretionary access control list (DACL) of an Active Directory Domain Services object.
The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> class contains properties of the access rule such as the trustee, access control type, access mask, and inheritance flags.
This type of access rule is set on an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity> object.

After the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity> object is committed to the directory store, it will modify the security descriptor of the object according to the rules set on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule> object.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, and access rule type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object which identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, access rule type, and inheritance type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, access rule type, and object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the object to which the access rule applies.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, access rule type, inheritance type, and inherited object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object which identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, access rule type, object type, and inheritance type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the object to which the access rule applies.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, Active Directory Domain Services rights, access rule type, object type, inheritance type, and inherited object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the rights of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the object to which the access rule applies.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
Gets the Active Directory Domain Services rights for this access rule.

A combination of one or more of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryRights"></xref> enumeration values that specify the Active Directory Domain Services access rights that are included in this rule.
Gets the inheritance type for this access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type for this access rule.
